roleset.name: put holes into

example.name: drilling for oil
example.text: The import quotas got only a 2 1/2-year extension, and USX is laboring under a staggering $5.8 billion debt at a time when it-1 must spend money *trace*-1 to upgrade steel mills and drill for oil.

example.name: ARG4 and ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Maxus said it did n't run a production test on the three discovery wells it drilled in the field , which is about 1.6 miles from the Intan Field , because the wells are similar to others drilled at its Intan and Widuri fields .
example.arg: in the field , which is about 1.6 miles from the Intan Field ,

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: The Iraqi Drilling Company succeeded , uh , in drilling seventy - five productive wells in the south oil fields , two months before the final delivery date , in addition to continuing to drill a hundred other wells and implementing maintenance operations for a big portion of the wells .
example.arg: seventy - five productive wells in the south oil fields
two months before the final delivery date
in addition to continuing to drill a hundred other wells and implementing maintenance operations for a big portion of the wells

example.name: arg4
example.text: Microdrilling refers to the drilling of holes less than 0.5 mm

example.name: Args 0, 1, 3
example.text: Administration is authorizing BP's contract to pipeline shale oil from Canada, their drilling for methane gas in the Rockies, and now the Arctic!
example.arg: in the Rockies, and now the Arctic!

roleset.note: DRILL-V NOTES: Note that 'drill for oil' is merely a specific type of generaldrilling; arg1 'the earth' is acquiring arg4 'holes' out of which arg3'oil' will be drawn. The drill itself (arg2) will only rarely appear. (from drill.01-v)
DRILLING-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, drill.01. Corresponds to VNcls carve-21.2-2. (from drilling.01-n)

roleset.name: train, make practice

example.name: drill sargeant
example.text: John drilled his (toy) soldiers in complex marching formations.

roleset.note: DRILL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'drill' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from drill.02-v predicate notes)
